entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:13 a.m. MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow this afternoon. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
